title: Infatuation: The Story of the Snow Queen
description: Kay and his sister Grace lose each other outside the Garden of Remembrance, a place where those seeking their loved ones gather to see if they have returned. Caught by a gale of Snow Bees, Kay is blown into the arms of the mysterious Snow Queen. They set off toward a fabled ice tower, on a journey that could change their lives and the world forever.
author: Nathan J.D.L. Rowark
